content: # Circulation Pump Diagnostic and Fault Finding Guide

### Common Pump Fault Codes and Meanings
| Manufacturer | Code | Meaning | Common Cause | Solution |
| Grundfos | E1 | Undervoltage | Power supply issue | Check power supply stability |
| Grundfos | E2 | Overvoltage | Power surge, grid issue | Voltage regulator, check supply |
| Grundfos | E3 | Dry running | Air in system, no water | Bleed system, check pressure |
| Wilo | F1 | Phase failure | Power connection issue | Check all power connections |
| Wilo | F4 | Overtemperature | Pump overload, ambient temp | Check for blockage, improve ventilation |
| Wilo | F5 | Short circuit | Winding damage, wiring fault | Check wiring, replace pump if internal |
| DAB | E1 | Dry running | No water, air lock | Prime pump, check water supply |
| DAB | E8 | Overheat | Excessive temperature | Check for blockage, flow restriction |
| System Type | Typical Flow Rate | Recommended Pump Head | Notes |
| Residential radiators | 15-20 l/min | 4-6 meters | Traditional systems |
| Underfloor heating | 10-15 l/min | 3-5 meters | Lower temp, higher flow |
| Fan coil units | 8-12 l/min | 3-4 meters | Per unit flow rate |
| Heat interface units | 15-25 l/min | 5-7 meters | Communal systems |
| Boiler primary circuit | 20-30 l/min | 5-7 meters | Boiler protection |
| Problem | Possible Causes | Diagnostic Checks | Solutions |
| No operation | Power issue, locked rotor, control failure | Check power, manual rotation, control signals | Restore power, free shaft, replace controller |
| Runs but no flow | Air lock, closed valve, blockage | Check valves, bleed pump, inspect impeller | Open valves, remove blockage, bleed system |
| Excessive noise | Air, cavitation, bearing failure | Listen for type of noise, check NPSH, bearings | Remove air, increase pressure, replace bearings |
| Overheating | Overload, low flow, electrical issue | Check amps, flow rate, resistance | Clear blockage, reduce speed, check windings |
| Intermittent operation | Thermal cut-out, control issue | Monitor cycle pattern, check temperatures | Improve cooling, check controls, reduce load |
| Incorrect speed | Signal issue, setting error | Check control signal, verify settings | Correct signal, adjust settings, check programming |
